remarks: A technical lemma for transfinite recursion.  Compare Lemma 1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 47.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2019.)
statement:
tfrlem1.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
tfrlem1.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( Fun F /\ A C_ dom F ) ) $.
tfrlem1.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( Fun G /\ A C_ dom G ) ) $.
tfrlem1.4 $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. A ( F ` x ) = ( B ` ( F |` x ) ) ) $.
tfrlem1.5 $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. A ( G ` x ) = ( B ` ( G |` x ) ) ) $.
tfrlem1 $p |- ( ph -> A. x e. A ( F ` x ) = ( G ` x ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
